text:
Premier League
Chelsea: the Blues, ready to let go Giroud?
Faced with the good performances of Abraham as holder and those of Batshuayi in lining, the Blues would now like to separate from Olivier Giroud.
07 Nov 2019, 09:20 by Charlie Creteur



Little used by Frank Lampard, Olivier Giroud is now third in the hierarchy of scorers behind Tammy Abraham and Michy Batshuayi. A complicated situation for the 2018 world champion, who would have liked to leave the club this summer without the refusal of Chelsea hit by a ban on recruitment. However, it seems that the deal has changed.




An interest from Crystal Palace and West Ham?




Frank Lampard + 14 üì∑Credit Photo - Icon Sport

According to information from the Daily Telegraph, the Blues would be ready to let go of the old Montpellier during the winter mercato. Thus, Crystal Palace and West Ham would closely watch the international tricolor seeking play time for the Euro 2020.
¬†Olivier Giroud: all information about the player
